notes: Tagger-WS is a web service that reads Polish text and outputs sentences divided into tokens where each token is labelled with a morphosyntactic tag and a lemma. The tagger uses NKJP tagset and Morfeusz SGJP analyser. The service is based on WCRFT.
title: Tagger WS
